biotools.summary: SPOT-Disorder-Single is a single-sequence method that is more accurate than SPOT-Disorder (a profile-based method) for proteins with few homologous sequences and comparable for proteins in predicting long-disordered regions.

bioschemas.name: SPOT-Disorder-Single
bioschemas.summary: SPOT-Disorder-Single is a single-sequence method that is more accurate than SPOT-Disorder (a profile-based method) for proteins with few homologous sequences and comparable for proteins in predicting long-disordered regions.
